content.p: Investigating the potential environmental and genetic causes of canine atopic dermatitis and skin allergies. Helping aid owners and veterinarians in diagnosing and managing this complex and distressing conditions. Discover more about The Itchy Dog Project and it's aims Understand Canine Atopic Dermatitis and related skin diseases Find out about the appropriate treatments for Atopic Dematitis Read our helpful resources for veterinary professionals Canine atopic dermatitis can be extremely uncomfortable and distressing for dogs. Weâ€™re pleased to support this research and play a key role in aiming to reduce the number of dogs who suffer from the condition. Runa Hanaghan, Deputy Veterinary Director of the Dogs Trust School of Veterinary Medicine and Science University of Nottingham Sutton Bonington Campus Leicestershire, LE12 5RD email: itchydogproject@nottingham.ac.uk
